title: God Bless Football: Brian Daboll's Briefcase
description:
Brian Daboll tells us how his famous introductory video came about and turns Stugotz and Billy against each other (3:44). The guys upset legend Pat Hanlon. Chris Simms tells us how many times a day he showers (24:19). Stu Ya Gotz (42:08). Mike Golic preps us for Tennessee vs. Georgia and his weekend with Stugotz at Notre Dame (45:51). Carl Douglas, Joba and K-Funk make picks as Mojo and Chris go missing (1:03:45). John O'Hurley inexplicably makes 5 NFL picks to take us into the big football weekend (1:19:16).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
